message: Hello Bob, this is Alice. I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. I want to assure you that all my products go through a rigorous quality control process. However, I don't want to oversell or undersell any product. I'll let you decide for yourself. Please consider the 50% chance of it being high-quality and make an informed decision based on your needs and expectations.
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on the details you've provided and considering the potential value, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.
